snippet: Since stumbling to start this lengthy road trip, the Los Angeles Kings have rebounded with consecutive victories, including a win against one of the NHL's hottest teams....
lead_paragraph: Since stumbling to start this lengthy road trip, the Los Angeles Kings have rebounded with consecutive victories, including a win against one of the NHL's hottest teams.

headline.main: Toffoli Scores in OT for Kings, Snaps Pens' Streak
headline.print_headline: Toffoli Scores in OT for Kings, Snaps Pens' Streak
